intro.title: Protect your tokens by backing up your seed phrase
intro.text: Tari Universe automatically sets up a wallet for you when you start mining. Make sure you always have access to your wallet by storing your seed phrase in a safe spot.

seedPhrase.title: Write down your seed phrase and store it somewhere safe
seedPhrase.text: You will need this code again to restore your wallet.
seedPhrase.checkbox: I understand that if I lose my recovery seed phrase I will not be able to restore my wallet.

verifySeed.title: Verify your seed phrase
verifySeed.text: To make sure you wrote down your seed phrase correctly, please select the words in the correct order.
verifySeed.placeholder: Click the words below in the correct order
